heroSection.title: Come together to change the world, one event at a time.
heroSection.paragraph: Join and organize volunteer events inspired by the Sustainable Development Goals. Collaborate with like-minded peers to multiply your impact on the world.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.registerDescription: Create your account to become a part of Pebble’s volunteer network.
howItWorks.attendEventsDescription: Browse events and join them! You can sort by date, location, and the SDGs.
howItWorks.organizeYourOwnDescription: Got a brilliant idea you want to pursue with others? Organize your own event!

sustainableGoals.title: Sustainable Development Goals
sustainableGoals.sustainableGoalsDescription: All events at Pebble fall under one of UN’s 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDG). The SDGs, intended to be achieved by 2030, are the blueprint to achieve a better and more sustainable future for all.

testimonials.title: Hear it from the volunteers
testimonials.personOneQuote: I love Pebble for helping me connect with young people like me who want to work toward a good cause.
testimonials.personTwoQuote: Pebble fills a crucial role in helping mobilize people around the Sustainable Development Goals.
testimonials.personThreeQuote: At Pebble, there is always an event that I am excited to join. If there isn’t, I can always organize one myself!

getStarted.title: Be the change you wish to see in the world.
getStarted.description: We need to work together—and work hard, if we want to reach the SDGs by 2030. Join Pebble now and start taking action.

header.title: About Pebble
header.description: Pebble is a place where you can find and start local movements and gatherings to support one or more of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals. We bring determined people together to make the world a better place. Our growing community makes us more passionate about what we do.

stack.techDesc: HTML, JavaScript, ReactJS, NextJS, npm - Testing: Jest -  Formatting: Prettier, ESLint - Styling: CSS, TailwindCSS - Translation: i18next - Version control: git, GitHub

header.title: Create an Event
header.subtitle: First, set your events’s location:
header.description: Pebble events can be both local or online. Choose where you want to host your event.

eventType.title: Choose event type:
eventType.description: Every pebble event should serve at least one of the sustainable development goals of United Nations. Which goal do you want to help in? Select all that apply.

eventInfo.titleDesc: Choose a title that will give people a clear idea of what the event is about. Feel free to be creative! You can edit this later if you change your mind.
eventInfo.descriptionDesc: Describe the purpose of your event. Who should join and what will you do at the event?
eventInfo.imgDesc: We have found that listings with a photo attract more interest.

guidelines.title: Almost Done! Just take a minute to review our guidlines.
guidelines.description: Pebble is all about helping people with the help of volunteers like you. This means that all events should:
guidelines.li1: Be transparent about the event’s intentions.
guidelines.li2: Encourage real human interactions in person or online.
guidelines.li3: Have the host present in all events.
guidelines.community: You can read more about all of this in our
guidelines.agree: Agree with terms and create event!
